seo.title: HK Precision - Precision Mechanical Technology | Plastic Molds & CNC Machining
seo.description: HK Precision Mechanical Technology specializes in manufacturing plastic molds, aluminum molds, stamping dies, fixtures, and inspection jigs with high precision. HITACHI, OKUMA CNC machining, Charmilles EDM. Manufacturing high-quality industrial, medical, and household plastic components in Vietnam.
